name: Hack This
description: INFO490 - Ali, Keller, Muhammad, Yul Song
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.gstatic.com/ https://*.firebaseio.com https://www.googleapis.com; object-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' wss://*.firebaseio.com; style-src * 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:;
